manual.title: Manual configuration
manual.description:
Sorry, we don't know what device this is: {name} ({type} at {host}). You can try to configure it manually by selecting an appropriate device class.

If you manage to make it work, please consider opening an issue or creating a pull request in the [python-broadlink]({url}) library.

reset.description:
Your device is locked for authentication. Follow the instructions to unlock it:
1. Factory reset the device.
2. Use the official app to add the device to your local network.
3. Stop. Do not finish the setup. Close the app.
4. Click Submit.
